transcript: It was lost. I waited near the conveyor belt to see where the baggage claim would come out.

segments.text: It was lost. I waited near the conveyor belt to see where the baggage claim would come out.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: It was lost.  I waited on the conveyor -- near the conveyor belt to see, you know, where -- then the baggage claim and see if it would- it would come out.
